item.description:
This looks interesting....David Duchovny as a bad guy might take a bit of getting used to for an XFiles Fan like myself.   But then again it is a move with David Duchovny, so how can I resist.

Showtime is 6:15.  I will be at the theater by 5:15 and we will head in for seats at 5:45. 

In general, I arrive at the theater an hour before the show to start gathering people, and we head in for seats about 30 minutes before the show, so we can sit together. This also allows us to take turns getting snacks, etc., before the previews start.

I encourage everyone to consider buying your tickets in advance.  We see most movies on opening weekend and they do often sell out.   Fandango.com is the site that this movie theater uses.  Be warned though, there are sometimes hiccups to the system, especially the mobile app.  Not being able to complete a transaction does not mean they are sold out.  Please do not post a comment to the site that the movie is sold out.   Zip me an email and I will check it out.  If it is indeed sold out, I will let people know.

If you miss the group ahead of time, come find us after. We gather in the hallway outside of the theater we just saw the movie in, to discuss the film a bit, allow for restroom breaks and to get a head count of all those who would like to go out after for drinks and munchies.

$$$$Managing the after event is much easier if everyone brings cash, so please plan ahead if you want to go out with the group after.$$$

Movie Details:

Release Date: March 1, 2013
Studio: RCR Distribution
Director: Todd Robinson
Screenwriter: Todd Robinson
Starring: Ed Harris, David Duchovny, William Fichtner, Lance Henriksen, Johnathon Schaech
Genre: Action, Thriller
Official Website: Phantomthefilm.com | Facebook

Plot Summary: Ed Harris plays the captain of a Cold War Soviet missile submarine who has secretly been suffering from seizures that alter his perception of reality. Forced to leave his wife and daughter, he is rushed into a classified mission, where he is haunted by his past and challenged by a rogue KGB group (led by David Duchovny) bent on seizing control of the ship's nuclear missile. With the fate of humanity in his hands, Harris discovers he was been chosen for this mission in the belief he would fail. "Phantom" is a suspense submarine thriller about extraordinary men facing impossible choices.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. If the movie is showing upstairs, I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator. If the movie is showing downstairs, I will be near the ropes by the concession stand.
item.name: Phantom (6:15PM Show)
